definitionGroups.group: Any of various species of flowering plants in certain genera in family Asteraceae, that typically repel insects:

entries.meaning: mostly in two tribes of subfamily Asteroideae
examples: On a sunny September morning, with the trees still green, but the asters and fleabanes already taking over in ditch and dalk, Van set out for Ladoga, N.A.

entries.meaning: Erigeron spp., especially Erigeron acre (blue fleabane)
Pulicaria spp. (false fleabane), especially common fleabane (Pulicaria dysenterica subsp. dysenterica, formerly  Inula dysenterica)
Also, in subfamily Cichorioideae, Vernonia spp. (ironweeds).
